prevtext.line: Hammond stated, on a recent edition of <ahref>Countdown (game show)|Countdown</ahref>, that he is no longer working as a general practitioner. Can anyone find a reliable source that confirms this? <ahref>User:Skinsmoke|Skinsmoke</ahref> (<ahref>User talk:Skinsmoke|talk</ahref>) 14:59, 18 November 2012 (UTC)

current_text.lines: Hammond stated, on a recent edition of <ahref>Countdown (game show)|Countdown</ahref>, that he is no longer working as a general practitioner. Can anyone find a reliable source that confirms this? <ahref>User:Skinsmoke|Skinsmoke</ahref> (<ahref>User talk:Skinsmoke|talk</ahref>) 14:59, 18 November 2012 (UTC)
current_text.plus: :M.D. states in ''Private Eye'' 1370 (11-24 July 2014) that he stopped general practice and is now a hospital doctor. On iwantgreatcare.org, which M.D. was recommending, [https://www.iwantgreatcare.org/doctors/dr-philip-hammond Dr Hammond describes himself] as an associate specialist in the young people's specialist Chronic Fatigue/ME service at the Royal National Hospital for Rheumatic Diseases NHS Fountation trust in Bath. I will edit the article to reflect this. <ahref>User:AlmostReadytoFly|AlmostReadytoFly</ahref> (<ahref>User talk:AlmostReadytoFly|talk</ahref>) 13:52, 23 July 2014 (UTC)

:M.D. states in ''Private Eye'' 1370 (11-24 July 2014) that he stopped general practice and is now a hospital doctor. On iwantgreatcare.org, which M.D. was recommending, [https://www.iwantgreatcare.org/doctors/dr-philip-hammond Dr Hammond describes himself] as an associate specialist in the young people's specialist Chronic Fatigue/ME service at the Royal National Hospital for Rheumatic Diseases NHS Fountation trust in Bath. I will edit the article to reflect this. <ahref>User:AlmostReadytoFly|AlmostReadytoFly</ahref> (<ahref>User talk:AlmostReadytoFly|talk</ahref>) 13:52, 23 July 2014 (UTC)
